name: Find the Differences - Sweet Candy Shop & Cupcakes Birthday Deserts Photo Difference Edition Free Game for Kids
name_original: Find the Differences - Sweet Candy Shop & Cupcakes Birthday Deserts Photo Difference Edition Free Game for Kids
description:
How fast can you find 5 differences?

"Find the Differences Sweet Shop Edition Pro" is here with the sweet desserts, candies, chocolates, cakes and more.


A CASUAL CLASSIC GAME FOR YOU
• The clock is ticking – find those differences quickly
• Each mistake will cost you time against the clock
• You have 3 hints to help you along the way
• Save your score and compare with friends
• Hours of gameplay with tons of photos to keep you entertained
